messages:
Name: lvaro Morata
Nationality: Spain
Date of Birth: October 23, 1992
Position: Attacker
Current club: Como
Serie A clubs played for: Juventus, Milan, Como

lvaro Morata, the Como attacker, has made 13 appearances in this season's Serie A, with 13 of these coming for his current club. He had previously played for Milan in the competition during 2025/2026.

The last Serie A game that Morata played came on December 6 for Como versus Internazionale; a game that he played 32 minutes in during a 4-0 loss. In total, the attacker has registered one league assist this season. He has been shown one yellow card.
Como next face a trip to Roma in Serie A action on December 15.
Last season, Morata played a combined 28 Serie A and Sper Lig games between Milan (16) and Galatasaray (12), scoring 11 goals and providing one assist.
Morata switched to Como in July 2026 from Milan, for whom he made 16 league appearances in total, scoring five goals.

It was on September 13, 2014 that Morata made his league debut during his spell at Juventus, aged 21 years and 325 days, versus Udinese. He first appeared in a Serie A fixture for current club Como in the encounter versus Lazio on August 24, 2025.
So far in his Serie A career, he has played 159 games in the competition, with 40 goals and 29 assists. Morata has also been sent off twice, with 26 yellow cards collected overall.
